events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit me well.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to a return needed for the product that did not fit.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the sizing issue. I am here to help you with your return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the item is unused and in its original packaging for the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unworn and still has the tags attached, packed as received.
Thank you for the details. Please use the prepaid return label we will email shortly to send the jacket back, and we will process your refund immediately upon receipt.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your full refund to the original payment method successfully.
Just checking in to ensure that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As the refund has been issued and the customer has no further questions, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
